sense.gloss: to be reluctant (to do), to be unwilling (to do), to hesitate (to do), to grudge, to be tardy (in doing), to put off (doing)
to falter, to slacken, to slow down
to have a frequent urge to defecate but difficulty passing stool, to suffer from tenesmus

sdata.j: あやはホットピンクや↑電子↑↓でん|し↓ブル|ーや↑深↑↓ふか↓↑紫↑↓むらさき↓といった↑激↑↓はげ↓しい↑色↑↓いろ↓が↑好↑↓す↓きだ。
sdata.e: Aya likes intense colors, such as hot pink, electric blue and deep purple.
